attributes.action: Make the House of Commons Speaker, whom ever it might be, sign legal documentation.
attributes.additional_details: Make the House of Commons Speaker, whom ever it might be, sign legal documentation ensuring that they DO NOT show bias towards any individual or party.  If they do show bias, appropriate action leading to removal is a consequence.  Let them be responsible for their actions as you and I have to be, after all that is what they being paid them for.  If you and I were in employed and showed such disrespect to any one "company" or "person" we would be held accountable, possibly leading to dismissal.  Their accommodation of "Grace & Favour" also needs to be reviewed and FULL tax payable on KIND benefits.
